name: 王郁文
objective:
一、防衛動員基本概念
二、防衛動員與全民國防
三、我國防衛動員簡介
四、防衛動員與緊急應變
五、防衛動員軍事訓練
1.Basic Concepts of Defense Mobilization
2.Defense Mobilization and All-out National Defense
3.Introduction to Defense Mobilization in Our Country
4.Defense Mobilization and Emergency Response
5.Military Training for Defense Mobilization
schedule:
一、防衛動員基本概念
上課週數：2
單元主題：防衛動員的定義與特質、防衛動員的類型、防衛動員與國家安全
二、防衛動員與全民國防
上課週數：2
單元主題：兩岸情勢對我國防衛動員的影響、防衛動員與全民國防的重要性、防衛動員是全民國防的具體實踐
三、我國防衛動員簡介
上課週數：2
單元主題：我國防衛動員法制、我國防衛動員機制、青年學生動員與防衛技能訓練
四、防衛動員與緊急應變
上課週數：2
單元主題：我國的緊急應變機制、防衛動員與緊急應變機制的整合、戰場抗壓及訓練
五、防衛動員軍事訓練
上課週數：8
單元主題：災害防救知能、災害防救、災防準備及防衛動員模擬演練、戰場急救與自救中暑防制與心肺復甦術
六、測驗
上課週數：2
1.Basic Concepts of Defense Mobilization
Course Duration: 2 weeks
Topics: Definition and Characteristics of Defense Mobilization, Types of Defense Mobilization, Defense Mobilization and National Security

2.Defense Mobilization and All-out National Defense
Course Duration: 2 weeks
Topics: The Impact of Cross-Strait Relations on Our Defense Mobilization, The Importance of Defense Mobilization and All-out National Defense, Defense Mobilization as the Practical Implementation of All-out National Defense

3.Introduction to Defense Mobilization in Our Country
Course Duration: 2 weeks
Topics: Legal Framework of Defense Mobilization in Our Country, Mechanisms of Defense Mobilization in Our Country, Youth Student Mobilization and Defense Skills Training

4.Defense Mobilization and Emergency Response
Course Duration: 2 weeks
Topics: Emergency Response Mechanism in Our Country, Integration of Defense Mobilization and Emergency Response Mechanisms, Battlefield Stress Resistance and Training

5.Military Training for Defense Mobilization
Course Duration: 8 weeks
Topics: Disaster Prevention and Relief Knowledge, Disaster Prevention and Relief, Disaster Preparedness and Defense Mobilization Simulation Drills, Battlefield First Aid and Self-Rescue, Heat Stroke Prevention, and CPR

6.Examination
Course Duration: 2 weeks
scorePolicy:
依考試成績、出席情況、學習態度、課前準備、課堂討論時的表現、學期報告… 等綜合評量，（依各授課教官上課要求為原則）
Comprehensive evaluation based on exam results, attendance, learning attitude, preparation before class, performance during class discussions, semester reports, etc. (In accordance with the requirements set by each instructor).
materials:
參考書目詳如授課教官規定
Reference materials are specified by the course instructor.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG16：和平正義與有力的制度（Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions）
